thread.title: How to make sense of the new mammogram guidelines
thread.title_full: Video: How to make sense of the new mammogram guidelines | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: How to make sense of the new mammogram guidelines
text: The American Cancer Society has revised its mammogram guidelines, recommending that women with an average risk of cancer start screenings at age 45, not 40. Judy Woodruff examines the guidelines and the debate with Dr. Richard Wender of the American Cancer Society.
